pli-tv-pvr2.16:5.3: Avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa adhakkhakaṃ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṃ gahaṇaṃ sādiyati, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.16:5.4: bhikkhu kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.16:5.8: kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyanapaccayā imā pañca āpattiyo āpajjati. #1
pli-tv-pvr2.16:6.1: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ kati vipattiyo bhajanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.16:6.6: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ dve vipattiyo bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr2.16:6.9: siyā pārājikāpattikkhandhena, siyā saṃghādisesāpattikkhandhena, siyā thullaccayāpattikkhandhena, siyā pācittiyāpattikkhandhena, siyā dukkaṭāpattikkhandhena.
pli-tv-pvr2.16:6.11: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato.
pli-tv-pvr2.16:6.14: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca … pe …. #2
pli-tv-pvr2.16:7.1: Dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr2.16:7.2: Dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.16:7.5: dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā imā dve āpattiyo āpajjati. #1
pli-tv-pvr2.16:8.1: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ kati vipattiyo bhajanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.16:8.6: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ ekaṃ vipattiṃ bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr2.16:8.11: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhanti, na vācato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr2.16:8.12: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhanti, na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr2.16:8.13: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr2.16:8.14: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti.
pli-tv-pvr2.16:8.17: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena cāti. #2
